page.title: 07Life Styles East Kilbride.
page.content: We visited the{sheltered housing which is situated beside our school. Most of the people had lived in{East {Kilbride}standard housing but one of them lived in sheltered housing somewhere else before coming to Plover Drive.The old people get a call from the wardens on the intercom twice a day to check that they are alright. On Mondays,Wednesdays and Fridays different meals are provided at the lunch club in the community centre. They all enjoy the many activities provided such as bingo,auctions and jumble sales.All have families visit them regularly.Although the busy Crosshouse Road is nearby the old people do not find it a problem.The ladies all liked living in Greenhills and thought no improvements could be made, but the hill to the shops seemed to be a drawback.
